website_summaries.verdict: Some users only require a wheelchair ramp to make quick transitions over sidewalks, door thresholds, and curbs. This portable model is great for quick accessibility in everyday situations.
pros: Includes a carrying handle and travel bag for independent use
Perforated slots for improved water drainage
cons: Ramp dimensions not ideal for all wheelchair types or threshold angles
Carrying handle hard to access when ramp is in use

customer_reviews.title: It's fabulous!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a fabulous assistive device. Not only is this great for getting in houses that aren't accessible, you need it for getting up on curbs, and it's unbelievable the businesses that don't have proper handicapped access. I comes in its own carrying bag. Anybody that happens to be around when I use it, is wonderfully surprised. If you transport anyone in a wheelchair, you should not be without it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Samigirl

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, very functional ramp
customer_reviews.text: We bought this ramp to have at the house to make it easier for a handicapped relative that visits occasionally with a scooter. Works very well for the front door step that is less than 3 inches, and for the one in the back that is about 7 inches. It is a strong, and well designed aluminum ramp with very nice carrying case. We have used it several times when we have had to move furniture or appliances in and out of the house as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive portable wheelchair ramp
customer_reviews.text: I have already purchased 3 of these ramps and am getting ready to buy a fourth to provide access for my wife's motorized chair over 3 to 6" steps in our home. They are a an excellent value (reasonably priced for what you get). The ramps tend to flex somewhat under heavy weight (I am over 200 lbs) and my wife's chair is more than that. But they have not bent . They are a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product as we were planning on packing and moving three rooms for new carpeting and had rented a Uhaul to store everything. This ramp really held up well and it made moving everything more efficient and easy. This is well built and handled the heavy loads easily. Really liked the portability and ease of folding and storing. Worked so well two weeks later used the ramp at a church to unpack their Uhaul and everyone commented on how light it was but sturdy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Stull

customer_reviews.title: really sturdy
customer_reviews.text: this will be really useful for managing the steps to a room we always get because it has a great beach view. the disabled access rooms don't have the steller view. the carrying bag is very sturdy also so you can check it when flying without worrying it will arrive in tatters. very good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Clodagh

customer_reviews.title: Ideal solution for non handicap accessible entryways.
customer_reviews.text: Although I've only needed to use it once it worked as expected. There were no issues with the handle as others had reported. The handle does not stick out beyond the ramps frame. If you have a scooter with one wheel in the front you can't go across the middle of the ramp. If you go either left or right of center it works fine. As others mentioned the picture shown has the ramp backwards.
customer_reviews.author: Gregorio Rivera Jr.

customer_reviews.title: I looked at a lot of ramps and this one was in my opinion the best for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: When I had my first wheel chair customer on my lot and and didn't have a way to help him in I vowed to not let that happen again. I looked at a lot of ramps and this one was in my opinion the best for what I needed. and by chance the same customer came back for repeat biz and was so happy I had the ramp. Thank you, Randy
customer_reviews.author: Randy Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Super deal for the cost!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ended up ordering 2 of the 3' 30" wheelchair ramps. They're made very well and aren't hard to move at all! Great carrying case! Makes our lives sooo much better!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Great ramp for manual wheelchair
customer_reviews.text: This works great for my fathers manual wheelchair. He has a 5 inch sunken den and this was the size to get for that height. I need 2 but purchased 1 to try. It is a bit heavy for my mom but not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Echols

customer_reviews.title: Just What I needed and Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: The 6ft Is really long, I wish it retracted In some way but other than that, It is exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Good ramp.
customer_reviews.text: This ramp gets the job done. It is not perfect as it does take some work to get it set up and more to put it away in the included bag but if you only need to use it occasionally it certainly works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Hasel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This has been a godsend for us. My grandmother went on vacation an able bodied adult and returned home in a wheelchair. Some quick adjustments needed to be made and this was just what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Stidam

customer_reviews.title: Great in every sense!
customer_reviews.text: What a greast find! It is strong, easy to set, and good price!
customer_reviews.author: JM Olvera

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Ramp
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent ramp that it easy to transport and has been used to help a person get up steps with a walker and wheelchair and it has been used to load and unload snowblowers in and out of vehicles. I am planning to purchase another one that is longer as well. It is well made and stays in place. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great ramp.
customer_reviews.text: I use this ramp to enter homes with one step up with no problem. Easily handles 600 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Butler

customer_reviews.title: Great little ramp, an essential for wheelchairs
customer_reviews.text: This product is essential for getting around in a power wheelchair. This little ramp is perfect for climbing a single step. It is strong, light weight and easy to carry. I keep it the van and it goes everywhere with me. The first ramp was damaged during shipping, but the vendor quickly replaced it.
customer_reviews.author: K BREDAHL

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Fits great for where I need it. Easy to fold up and store in the bag that’s included.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole P

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: my patients loved this ramp, they asked me to order it so the patient could get the patio (he is wheelchair bound). ramp is not heavy and patients wife is able to fold and lift to remove the ramp out of the way if they do not wish to have it set up when company is over.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 1 step entry
customer_reviews.text: Should be reinforced with 2 screws at the top of the ramp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It works well over an uneven gutter to get a wheel chair from sidewalk to street. Good price also
customer_reviews.author: Robert K

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works good for wheelchair had to train the dog to walk down it
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Portable
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Handle is not in the way. Nice and lightweight so you can store them off to the side and put them out when you need them.
customer_reviews.author: Pocketbat

customer_reviews.title: Width needs to be a couple of inches wider.
customer_reviews.text: The ramp is great, except the width makes it difficult to maneuver an electric wheelchair on without the wheels catching on the side edges.
customer_reviews.author: Shelah

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. I don't need to say more. I recommend this ramp.
customer_reviews.author: Joan H.

customer_reviews.title: Handle Issue
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality ramp and would get a high rating except for the ridiculous placement of the carrying handle. When the ramp is opened up, the handle becomes positioned on the bottom side, in the center, and forcibly held in a vertical position with respect to the ramp bottom. This means that the ramp has to be used on a fairly high step or it will "teeter-toter" on the handle. I had no choice but to drill out the handle so that I could use the ramp.
customer_reviews.author: Texas User

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It works ok. The handle on this ramp makes it difficult to get it to lay straight and makes it unstable. If mounted it might be ok but it is advertised as "portable".
customer_reviews.author: Jen D

customer_reviews.title: Great forgetting from a parking lot up onto a sidewalk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ramp to help a local grocery delivery company get their rolling carts and hand trucks with my groceries to my back door where I can take them into the house, the local sidewalk doesn't have a curb cut. It works fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Black

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item for my dad whose in a wheelchair. It's very compact, easy to carry and fits perfectly in the doorway. My dad loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Helpful.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. A little clunky to load into the car but very easy to use. It's sturdy too!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: loved it. makes it easier to get into the
customer_reviews.text: loved it. makes it easier to get into the house
customer_reviews.author: Irma Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: After trying several sizes, this one was perfect. The handle folds down which was a concern for me, but it makes placement perfect. Its as light weight as a 6 foot ramp can be and I am a sort person so it is bigger than I am. However, I can lift, move, and place it with little issues. I use for the can and for our house. It also works when visiting others to get my daughters wheelchair in. (As long as there are not multiple stairs.)
customer_reviews.author: Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely totally perfect for Mom
customer_reviews.text: Enabled 120# caregiver to get Mom in her wheelchair into house without calling for help.
customer_reviews.author: kccardif

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and compact.
customer_reviews.text: Good buy. Folds and is perfect for travel. Good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Batiste

customer_reviews.title: met expectation
customer_reviews.text: meets expectations. seems weaker and scary that it might not hold the weight. Just barely wide enough for my drive wheelchair. But it is great for portable and works for most anywhere I go.
customer_reviews.author: E. Skousen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and very sturdy to support me in the wheelchair. I love the portability as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty support
customer_reviews.text: Compact portable and strong enough to hold my 400 lb wheelchair
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was quite a bit heavier than I thought it would be...not unusable, but still heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Helps very well on doors and if you have 2 steps it covers very well.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Duran

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to get a wheelchair in and out of a house. This works great over the door way of the patio door and the carport door. Very please.
customer_reviews.author: L. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed perfect; now I can get out the house and ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed perfect ; now I can get out the house and for that I want to thank you
customer_reviews.author: leola Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, measurements are wrong!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed, the ramp is not 30” wide, it is 27.5” wide on the inside and 28” outside. Unsafe to use with a walker, too short based on their chart for step height and a wheelchair would not fit .
customer_reviews.author: D. Winters

customer_reviews.title: life changer!!!
customer_reviews.text: it maybe portable but I havent ever moved it yet, since I have a sidewalk that has a step up on a graded property it works perfectly traveling from house to garage, may keep it there after my surgeries are healed, since I have forgotten the step was there several times walking out to the garage at night, stepping off isn't fun if you didnt see the step
customer_reviews.author: Levi_Brand

customer_reviews.title: Ramp
customer_reviews.text: This ramp is the perfect solution to assist my 100 year old Aunt indoors and outdoors with her walker and wheelchair!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. We bought it to allow a friend to get up the step to our door. Also was a great help to get him chair over our neighborhoods sloped curbs. He's technically over the recommended weight limit, but it held up like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Xeno

customer_reviews.title: Great ramp for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Took a trip recently and needed the ramp to get over the step that was in the entrance of the Airbnb. It's a bit heavy the ramp (for me at least) but for my travel companions, carrying and unfolding the ramp was really easy and not to difficult to move.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good product but too narrow for us
customer_reviews.text: This was a great quality product. It was sturdy. The incline was not too steep for a single 5” step. It was too narrow for our use. We returned it for a 6’, extra wide ramp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well with the Drive wheelchair
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect companion to the Drive wheelchair and a must have to get down the steps leading up to the front door of many houses.
customer_reviews.author: lukinagin

customer_reviews.title: Great ramp
customer_reviews.text: Works great just as described however if you are going higher than 1 step or 13 inches in height I would recommend going with the 4ft ramp.
customer_reviews.author: Dwetterm

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: It works perfect for what we bought it for. My mom is in a wheelchair and when she comes to visit, we pull it out and she can be wheeled right into the front door with no problem whatsoever!
customer_reviews.author: Lora B

customer_reviews.title: Love how light it is which makes it easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: Love how light it is which makes it easy to move from one area to another and yet it can hold up a human being and a wheelchair. It's great to be able to carry it with me in it's provided carry bag to friends and family homes that do not have wheel chair access.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: i returned this product it was to small for the van.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic product. My wife had foot surgery and spent ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product. My wife had foot surgery and spent 2 weeks as non weight bearing and using a knee scooter. We used this to get her in the house over 2 different Thresholds. Great idea. In some ways I should have got a longer one (I got 3 foot version) because it is a tad steep. However it is very portable and lightweight. Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: J. Chris Kiser

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, no need to build a permanent ramp.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for your home if you have people on walkers or wheelchairs coming over. Better than building a permanent ramp.
customer_reviews.author: AMG

customer_reviews.title: No assembly required!!
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed to get Dad's wheelchair up and over a step. No assembly required and comes with a storage bag to protect your car if you need to take it with you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did't work !!!
customer_reviews.text: It didn't fit properly over the two leading from the garage into the kitchen. I should have measured before I ordered😞
customer_reviews.author: Bubbles Bubbles

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Got it to get mobility scooter out of house works good as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very light but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for one step. Much sturdier than I thought it would be. It does not slip off the tp at all. Very easy to fold and transport.
customer_reviews.author: W01fG1rl

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great fircgrttingvib and outt of house and over small steps
customer_reviews.author: Reco Williams

customer_reviews.title: The ease of maneuvering the ramp was a life saver for me.
customer_reviews.text: It was very useful on curns and getting the w/c into the van ny myself.
customer_reviews.author: SJM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this ramp! Very easy to take it out of the bag and to set it up, use it and then put it back away. The handle design looks like it has been changed from what is pictured and was potentially causing trouble for some people. This ramp allows me to easily take an elderly lady outside in her wheelchair for walks and also for wheelchair transport to appointments.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Worked very well with wheelchair. When covered in snow ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well with wheelchair. When covered in snow and ice, I just picked it up and put in the garage to wait for the ice to melt. Very convenient for stationary and also on the go.
customer_reviews.author: susan barczak

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This ramp works great! We are now able to go to friends homes without needing extra help to lift the wheelchair up the front step.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene B. Burleson III

customer_reviews.title: Just bought this ramp. It appears to do the ...
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this ramp. It appears to do the job. I use it move enter/exit from a sliding door that has a hight of 3". The handle does not get in the way.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Barber

customer_reviews.title: made of nice steel.
customer_reviews.text: worked as intended. works very well. made of nice steel .
customer_reviews.author: george

customer_reviews.title: but I had to load my riding mower on my trailer and it is perfect. the right key for the right slot
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for my scooter but it was too short and I was going to return it , but I had to load my riding mower on my trailer and it is perfect.the right key for the right slot , Thank You Amazon
customer_reviews.author: dino6543

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Now I can get to the front of the house with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Not able to return after no use after 30 days
customer_reviews.text: Needed to return after my total knee replacement surgery & recovery both in rehab center and at home after not even using it but not able to return after 30 days. Sad state of affairs!
customer_reviews.author: JT

product_meta.title: Drive Medical Single Fold Portable Wheelchair Scooter Ramp with Carry Handle and Travel Bag, 3 Feet Long, Gun Metal (3 Feet X 30 Inch)
product_meta.description: Size:3 Feet x 30 InchThe Wheelchair and Scooter Ramp by Drive Medical is designed for transitioning a wheelchair or scooter from one surface height to another. The durable, folding, lightweight construction allows for the ramp to be easily transported in its carry bag. This ramp was especially designed with perforated slots to keep water from collecting on the ramp and ensuring users safety while in use. This 3' long ramp allows for up to a 6" rise in surface height. The ramp has a total weight capacity of 600 lbs.
feature_bullets: Designed to transition wheelchair or scooter from one surface to another
Perforated slots keep water from collecting on ramp
Overall Dimensions: 37"(L) x 28.5"(W) x 4"(H); Inside Track Width: 26.5"; Weight Capacity: 600 lbs

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
